mt.gloss: a unit of weight equivalent to 1000 kilograms
a state in northwestern United States on the Canadian border
the use of computers to translate from one language to another

mt. ararat.gloss: the mountain peak that Noah's ark landed on as the waters of the great flood receded

mt. everest.gloss: a mountain in the central Himalayas on the border of Tibet and Nepal

mt. mckinley.gloss: a mountain in south central Alaska

mt. olympus.gloss: a mountain peak in northeast Greece near the Aegean coast

mt. rainier.gloss: a mountain peak in central Washington

mt. rushmore.gloss: a mountain in the Black Hills of South Dakota

mt. st. helens.gloss: an active volcano in the Cascade Range in southwestern Washington

mt. vesuvius.gloss: a volcano in southwestern Italy on the Mediterranean coast

mt orizaba.gloss: an extinct volcano in southern Mexico between Mexico City and Veracruz
